mapper.select: SELECT emp.ID AS employeeId, emp.NAME AS employeeName, team.ID AS teamId, team.NAME AS teamName, dept.ID AS departmentId, dept.NAME AS departmentName, center.ID AS centerId, center.NAME AS centerName, tabRel.ID AS tabRelationId, tabTop.ID AS topTabId, tabTop.NAME AS topTabName, tabBottom.ID AS bottomTabId, tabBottom.NAME AS bottomTabName, tabRel.IS_PUBLIC AS isPublic, joinEmp.IS_LEADER AS isLeader FROM tbl_employee AS emp JOIN tbl_team AS team ON emp.TEAM_ID = team.ID JOIN tbl_department AS dept ON team.DEPARTMENT_ID = dept.ID JOIN tbl_center AS center ON dept.CENTER_ID = center.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_join_employee AS joinEmp ON emp.ID = joinEmp.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_tab_relation AS tabRel ON joinEmp.TAB_ID = tabRel.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_tab_top AS tabTop ON tabRel.TOP_TAB_ID = tabTop.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_tab_bottom AS tabBottom ON tabRel.BOTTOM_TAB_ID = tabBottom.ID WHERE emp.ID = #{employeeId}
